org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication

Class DisableReplicationUserData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.ReplicationUserData
      • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.DisableReplicationUserData

  • public class DisableReplicationUserData
extends ReplicationUserData
    This class is used to store the information provided by the user to disable replication. It is required because when we are in interactive mode the ReplicationCliArgumentParser is not enough.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      DisableReplicationUserData()

      boolean disableAll()
      Tells whether the user wants to disable all the replication from the server.
